樕字的基本解释

樕
sù
〔朴樕〕ａ．小树，如“林有樕樕。”ｂ．喻平庸，如“青臣樕樕不足齿。”

樕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》桑谷切，入屋，心。］
亦作“1”。

樕字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樕； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页550第05
【唐韻】桑谷切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蘇谷切，?音速。【說文】樸樕，小木也。【詩·召南】林有樸樕。　又【爾雅·釋木】樕樸，心。【郭註】心，槲樕別名。【疏】槲樕有心能濕，江河閒以作柱。

樕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
樕字的起名意思

暂无。

樕
Basic explanation of words
樕
sù
[Park Xiu] a. Small trees, such as "the forest has beautiful flowers." b. Yu mediocre, such as "The young minister is not enough."
樕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
["Guangyun" Sanggu cuts, enters the house, heart. ]
Also called "1".
樕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　樕; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 550 05
[Tang Yun] Sang Gu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Su Gu cut, the speed of sound. [Said Wen] Park Ye, Xiao Mu Ye. [Poetry·Zhaonan] Lin Youpuyue.　[Erya Shimu] Piao, heart. [Guo Note] Heart, another name for Quxiu. 【Sparse】The quesadilla has the heart to be wet, and the rivers are idle as a pillar.
